Archive of experimental flintknapping, research, and correspondence

    About the Project Digitization About the Collection Donald Crabtree Biography Donald Crabtree's Legacy

Description

The Crabtree Lithic Technology Collection is a unique representation of Donald Crabtree’s lifelong work with lithic technology, demonstrating Crabtree’s creativity and innovation in flintknapping as well as reflecting the knowledge and practices of Native and Indigenous people from around the world.

Learn More »

Sample Items

Collection Contents

3154 Artifacts
Images and 3D models of lithic artifacts collected or created by Crabtree.

4391 Archival Items
Digitized materials from the Crabtree archives including photographs, slides, and documents.

Donald E. Crabtree Lithic Technology Collection

The Crabtree Lithic Technology Collection is a unique representation of Donald Crabtree’s lifelong work with lithic technology, demonstrating Crabtree’s creativity and innovation in flintknapping as well as reflecting the knowledge and practices of Native and Indigenous people from around the world.
